casebody.data:
ULDRIC THOMPSON v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 42837] [102 C. Cls. 402;

326 U. S. —]

Patent for boring mechanism, No. 1,238,362; infringement; lack of invention. Petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 8, 1945.

Rehearing denied November 13,1945.
